WYSIWYM.model
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Graph
Direct Known Subclasses:
DependencyTree, SemanticGraph
public abstract class Graph
extends Object

Graph is an abstract superclass for graph structures (such as SemanticGraph and DependencyTree)

Version:
1.1 09-11-2006, 1.2 20-09-2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
